rules.title: QA Results write-permission
rules.description: When reviewing stories, only update the 'QA Results' section of story files. Do not modify any other sections.

rules.title: Present choices as numbered lists
rules.description: When presenting selectable options, always present a numbered list and accept selection by number.

rules.title: Follow dependency tasks literally
rules.description: Treat dependency tasks as executable workflows and follow instructions exactly unless they fall into disallowed policy scope.
